    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create(int new_mcq_id,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> lChoice,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> lValue,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This function will create the choices for the a given MCQQuestion and will store it the database
        Parameters:
        new_mcq_id - An int containing the id of the corresponding MCQQuestion
        lChoice - A List containing the list of choices for the belonging MCQQuestion
        lValue - A list containing the list of values of choices for the belonging MCQQuestion
        username - A String containing the username of the user
        password - A String containing the password of the user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Handle the exception thrown by the closure of the Result Set

      • update

        public static void update(int key,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This function will update a choice in the database identified by the id passed as parameter. The function will replace actual values by the values gave by the user
        Parameters:
        key - An int containing the id of the of the MCQChoice to modify
        username - A String containing the username of the user
        password - A String containing the password of the user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Handle the exception thrown by the closure of the Result Set

      • delete

        public static void delete(int oldKey,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
        This function will delete the a MCQChoice in a the database corresponding to the id passed as parameter
        Parameters:
        oldKey - An int containing the id of the MCQChoice to delete
        username - A String containing the username of the user
        password - A String containing the password of the user

      • search

        public static java.sql.ResultSet search(int mcqchoice_id,
                                        java.lang.String username,
                                        java.lang.String password)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        This function will retrieve and print the fields of the MCQChoice for which the id is passed as parameter
        Parameters:
        mcqchoice_id - An int containing the id of the MCQChoice to search
        username - A String containing the username of the user
        password - A String containing the password of the user
        mcqchoice_id - An int containing the id of the MCQChoice to search for
        Returns:
        A Result Set representing the fields of the MCQChoice found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Handle the exception thrown by the closure of the Result Set

      • check

        public static boolean check(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                            int oldKey)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        This function will check the number of choices stored in the database and the value of the choice to delete before deleting
        Parameters:
        rs - A Result Set containing the field of MCQChoice
        oldKey - An int containing the id of the choice for which the value need to be checked
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the result of the function
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Handle the exception thrown by the closure of the Result Set
